entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
